alert.note: Alert for Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 12:18PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, except 8 to 18 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Hills/Albion Mountains-Raft River Region- Including the cities of Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
